artist: Artist: Randy Tuten; Artist: D. Bread (William Bostedt aka "Daddy Bread"); Photographer: Jim Mabbhell; Printer: Tea Lautrec Litho, San Francisco
description: double exposed, color image of Janis Joplin performing, framed by white, red and pink jukebox; green text at top; white and gray border with scalloped pattern; black background

title: Janis Joplin and Her Band, Savoy Brown, Aum, Winterland, March 20-22, 1969, Fillmore West, March 23, 1969
